verses.roman:
śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya, advaita, nityānanda
śrīvāsa-gadādharādi yata bhakta-vṛnda

synonyms: śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; advaita—Advaita Ācārya Prabhu; nityānanda—Nityānanda Prabhu; śrīvāsa—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; gadādhara-ādi—and others like Gadādhara; yata—all; bhakta-vṛnda—all devotees.
translation: [Herein the author again describes the Pañca-tattva.] Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya, Prabhu Nityānanda, Śrī Advaita, Gadādhara, Śrīvāsa and all the devotees of Lord Caitanya.
